Package Services

Class GameService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.GameService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameService
    public class GameService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameService
    Sends information to tier 3 using sockets about Games

    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        public Game getGame​(java.lang.String gameName)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Takes a game name as a parameter, creates an object of Game, only with the name of the game puts it in a GamePackage object with a type "getGame" and sends it to the Database server. The Database server then return an object of GamePackage with the complete Game object that was found by the game name given in the parameters

        Specified by:
        getGame in interface IGameService
        Parameters:
        gameName - The name of the game
        Returns:
        A game object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • getGameCluster

        public GameCluster getGameCluster​(int page)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Asks for all games from the database server, then divides all the games into different pages and returns a GameCluster of games for the page asked in the parameters

        Specified by:
        getGameCluster in interface IGameService
        Parameters:
        page - a number of the page
        Returns:
        GameCluster object with the games from the page given
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
